snippet: The three-day visit to San Pedro Sula, Honduras, has been tailored so American players will not encounter any of the city, which was labeled the world’s most violent.
abstract: United States soccer team's three-day visit to San Pedro Sula, Honduras, for World Cup qualifying match is designed to keep players out of harms way in city identified as most violent in the world.
lead_paragraph: The three-day visit to San Pedro Sula, Honduras, has been tailored so American players will not encounter any of the city, which was labeled the world’s most violent.

headline.seo: U.S. Prepares for Honduras as Others Keep Danger at Bay
headline.main: U.S. Soccer Team Lets Others Keep Danger at Bay
